input_params.label: Steps
input_params.name: target_steps
input_params.description: Number of steps to run model for

input_params.label: p_{n}(0)
input_params.name: pn0
input_params.description: Initial biomass of native host

input_params.label: m_{n}(0)
input_params.name: mn0
input_params.description: Initial biomass of native microbial community

input_params.label: p_{i}(0)
input_params.name: pi0
input_params.description: Initial biomass of invasive host

input_params.label: m_{i}(0)
input_params.name: mi0
input_params.description: Initial biomass of invasive microbial community

input_params.label: r_{pn}
input_params.name: rp_n
input_params.description: Intrinsic growth rate (native host)

input_params.label: r_{pi}
input_params.name: rp_i
input_params.description: Intrinsic growth rate (invasive host)

input_params.label: μ_{pn}
input_params.name: mup_n
input_params.description: Maintenance rate (native host)

input_params.label: μ_{pi}
input_params.name: mup_i
input_params.description: Maintenance rate (invasive host)

input_params.label: μ_{mn}
input_params.name: mum_n
input_params.description: Maintenance rate (native microbes)

input_params.label: μ_{mi}
input_params.name: mum_i
input_params.description: Maintenance rate (invasive microbes)

input_params.label: d
input_params.name: d
input_params.description: Default ratio of host to microbial biomass

input_params.label: q_{hpn}
input_params.name: qhp_n
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources received from microbes into host biomass (native)

input_params.label: q_{hpi}
input_params.name: qhp_i
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources received from microbes into host biomass (invasive)

input_params.label: q_{cpn}
input_params.name: qcp_n
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources supplied to microbes into host biomass (native)

input_params.label: q_{cpi}
input_params.name: qcp_i
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources supplied to microbes into host biomass (invasive)

input_params.label: q_{cmn}
input_params.name: qcm_n
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources received from hosts into microbial biomass (native)

input_params.label: q_{cmi}
input_params.name: qcm_i
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources received from hosts into microbial biomass (invasive)

input_params.label: q_{hmn}
input_params.name: qhm_n
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources supplied to hosts into microbial biomass (native)

input_params.label: q_{hmi}
input_params.name: qhm_i
input_params.description: Conversion factor: resources supplied to hosts into microbial biomass (invasive)

input_params.label: c_{pni}
input_params.name: cp_ni
input_params.description: Competitive effect of native host population on invasive host population

input_params.label: c_{pin}
input_params.name: cp_in
input_params.description: Competitive effect of invasive host population on native host population

input_params.label: c_{mni}
input_params.name: cm_ni
input_params.description: Competitive effect of native microbial community on invasive microbial community

input_params.label: c_{min}
input_params.name: cm_in
input_params.description: Competitive effect of invasive microbial community on native microbial community

input_params.label: α_{nn}
input_params.name: alpha_nn
input_params.description: Rate of microbes to hosts resource supply (native - native)

input_params.label: β_{nn}
input_params.name: beta_nn
input_params.description: Rate of hosts to microbes resource supply (native - native)

input_params.label: α_{ii}
input_params.name: alpha_ii
input_params.description: Rate of microbes to hosts resource supply (invasive - invasive)

input_params.label: β_{ii}
input_params.name: beta_ii
input_params.description: Rate of hosts to microbes resource supply (invasive - invasive)

input_params.label: α_{ni}
input_params.name: alpha_ni
input_params.description: Rate of microbes to hosts resource supply (native - invasive)

input_params.label: β_{in}
input_params.name: beta_in
input_params.description: Rate of hosts to microbes resource supply (native - invasive)

input_params.label: α_{in}
input_params.name: alpha_in
input_params.description: Rate of microbes to hosts resource supply (invasive - native)

input_params.label: β_{ni}
input_params.name: beta_ni
input_params.description: Rate of hosts to microbes resource supply  (invasive - native)
